name: Totally Normal Game (Kawaii-Kowai Games)
description: A short interactive fiction game about an NPC who becomes your friend. She doesn't have a name, but she names herself POOP?!? Well, she ends up being MEME.LOL instead. She is a great, hilarious friend... but she doesn't want to say goodbye when the game ends. This game contains surreal horror. It is not suitable for children or the faint of heart.
